About Me


BIO

Ever since I was a child I have gravitated towards technology... I consider myself curious and sensible in regards to the power that comes with digital products which motivates me to constantly learn new technologies in a very fast but thorough way. In a nutshell: unstoppable and constant apprentice.

DM Home / Dismogas

Web Developer and Systems Coordinator

Dismogas is a leader on the gas appliances industry. As a coordinator I was in charge of all topics related to systems engineering and web development. One of my main achievementes was migrate the customer database from Excel to MongoDB and the website from Wordpress to React.

MakeIt Real Camp

Full Stack Web Developer

This was an intensive and full-time program imparted during 12 weeks where I learned about algorithms and data structures, web design with HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, React, Redux and common Node libraries. I algo learned to configure backend with Node.js using SQL and NoSQL Databases like MongoDB or Firebase.

Dev.f - Red Ribbon

MERN Stack Web Developer

This was a 4-week program focused on developing robust web applications using the Client-Server architecture. We address issues such as ECMAscript 6, Object-oriented programming, Advanced Javascript, Server Side Programming, Introduction to Databases and Customer Side Programming.
